name: Pootin Shootin (betabytes)
description:
Your job is simple. When the top of the red bar lines up within the white missile indicator, smash that "a" button to prevent pootin from launching a missile at your homeland. If you successfully defend against three missile launches, congratulations! You've saved the world... for now... but Pootin will (immediately) attempt to initiate another missile strike, this time with even higher difficulty! However, if you fail to deflect three missiles, the world will end! 

Good luck! 

Controls: 

"a" button: Press the A button when it lines up with the white missile indicator to destroy the incoming missile.
